title: File Organizer
description: A Python script that organizes files into folders based on their extensions. Ideal for cleaning up messy download folders.

title: Web Scraper CSV
description: Scrapes quotes and authors from a demo website and exports them to a CSV file. Built with `requests`, `BeautifulSoup`, and file handling.

title: Inventory Tracker
description: A terminal-based inventory system that tracks product name, quantity, and price. Uses CSV for persistence and includes update/delete functionality.
